doc.title: ...go I
doc.plot: ...go I is a contemporary exploration of a family's life in urban New York. Over the span of two days a homeless man sits vigil across the street from a brownstone occupied by a mother and her two young sons. The homeless man's intentions are questionable. Why does he sit? Why does he watch? On the second day the mother approaches the man to offer him some money. It is then that the relationship between them becomes clear and the tragedy of the situation is revealed.

Why does he watch? On the second day the mother approaches the man to offer him some money. It is then that the relationship between them becomes clear and the tragedy of the situation is revealed.
